text:
Hi all.

I am currently developing an app that I want to list on HubSpot marketplace.

I am in the phase to create a settings page for the App (1552654) and have one question regarding this. I am trying to set up the Account Component (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/create-an-app-settings-page#set-up-the-account-component>) and I am using the provided example url <http://api-eu1.hubapi.com/application/settings/test/v1/actions/accounts-fetch|api-eu1.hubapi.com/application/settings/test/v1/actions/accounts-fetch>. But I only get the test accounts called John Doe etc.

So what do I do now? Is this something that can be skipped? Should I develop something else? Then how?
Understood, thank you. At present, although HubSpot is not recommended, it is not absolutely prohibited. Thank you again for your answer
Yeah most people either build entire on HubSpot or entirely in a chrome extension
if you have multiple business units, can you add a Shopify integration for each business unit if they have separate stores?
